alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chester, southwestern York and southeastern Cherokee Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Gaffney, or 5 miles west of Hickory Grove, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... York, Sharon, Hickory Grove, Bullock Creek and Saratt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
